overview_of_class: An intensive writing workshop designed to help third-year art history Ph. D. students develop their dissertation proposals.
name: Dissertation Proposal Writing
title: WCAS ART_HIST 406-0-20 Dissertation Proposal Writing

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: An intensive writing workshop designed to help third-year art history Ph. D. students develop their dissertation proposals.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Assessment will be based on weekly writing exercises and participation in class discussion.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Readings will be posted on Canvas or made available on reserve at the main library
